titleStmt.title: The advantages which will manifestly accrue to this kingdom by abatement of interest from six to four per. cent
titleStmt.author: Culpeper, Thomas, Sir, 1626-1697.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by T.L. for Christopher Wilkinson, at the Black-Boy over against St. Dunstans Church in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: T. C. (i.e. Sir Thomas Culpeper).
Reproduction of the original in the Goldsmiths' Library, University of London.
